text: Halit is a Turkish given name for males, equivalent to the Arabic Khalid. People named Halit include: *Halit Akçatepe, Turkish actor *Halit Berzeshta, Albanian warlord *Halit Ergenç, Turkish actor *Halit Karsıalan, commonly known as "Deli" Halid Pasha, military officer of the Ottoman Army and a general of the Turkish Army *Halit Refiğ, Turkish film director *Halit Ziya Uşaklıgil, Turkish author *Refik Halit Karay (1888–1965), Turkish writer and journalist ==See also== *Khalid (disambiguation) Category:Turkish masculine given names
title: Halit
